exceptions.exn: The LHS of H_eq (a _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a, b : nat -> V x : K l : V H_eq : forall n : nat, a n = b n H_pseries_a : is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (a k)) l n : V -> Prop x0 : posreal H0 : forall y : V, ball l x0 y -> n y Unable to unify "is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (a k)) l" with "filtermap (sum_n (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (b k))) eventually n".

original: intros H_eq H_pseries_a. unfold is_pseries. unfold is_pseries in H_pseries_a. intros n. rewrite H_eq. apply H_pseries_a.
